basic.description: This course provides support and guidance to science education students participating in student teaching. The course focus is on classroom management and planning, professional ethics, and school law.
basic.subject: SCE
basic.title: Classroom Management and Planning in Science Education

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EDF 1005, EDF 2085, EME 2040, SCE 4320, SCE 4362, SCE 4363, and TSL 4324. Corequisite: SCE 4944.
